title: Book Cover, 1964
inscribed: Printed in small black text, upper left corner:XXXII International Biennial Exhibition of Art   Venice  1964; lower right corner: XXXII Espozitione Biennale Internazionale d'Arte   Veniezia   1964; vertically in "U" on left: United States of America; in "U" on right: Stati Uniti d'America.
provenance: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Vertical initials usa, repeating and alternating in red and blue, to form a diagonal band across a white background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, 1964.
1964. Offset lithograph on paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-62.
